Description: 
This application implements a command called "HelloWPf"  to demonstrate the use of the WPF window.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use WPFSample.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the WPFSample.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "HelloWPf" command and drag the slider or click the button on the dialog box to change the text size.
